attributes.action: Introduce a Law called the immigration reciprocity act that proscribes the same rights and privileges covering social security/unemployment benefit, access to free health care, right to buy land, right to citizenship, right to vote and all other benefits available to visiting, working and immigrant foreigners as those afforded by their governments to visiting, working and immigrant British citizens in their territory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All rights afforded to british citizens by foreign national governments when the british citizen is within their terratory, should be exactly mirrored to their national citizens as rights afforded to them by the British government once they are within British terratory
